Class BaseUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utility.BaseUtils
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GenericSteps, HomePage, HomeSteps, RegistrationPage, RegistrationSteps, SearchItemPage, SearchItemSteps, SignInPage, SignInSteps

    public class BaseUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds generic action methods that can be used across framework
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Arpit Kothari (arpitkothari45@gmail.com)
